titleStmt.title: Abuses stript, and whipt. Or Satirical essayes. By George Wyther. Diuided into two bookes
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for Francis Burton, and are to be solde at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Green-Dragon,

notesStmt.note: In this edition A4r line 1 of text has: whome.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Some print show-through; some pages tightly bound.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Green-Dragon
